title: (Thurs Early) Bobby Admits He Was Wrong About Something + Eddie Calls Out the Girls on the Show Again + Mailbag: Can My 10-Year-Old Watch Forrest Gump?
itunes:title: (Thurs Early) Bobby Admits He Was Wrong About Something + Eddie Calls Out the Girls on the Show Again + Mailbag: Can My 10-Year-Old Watch Forrest Gump?
description:
Bobby admits he was wrong about something he said recently and owns up to it. Eddie calls out the girls again for only dressing up for male artists and not female artists…he brings in new evidence. In the mailbag, a mom has a son who loves movies and wants to know if it’s appropriate for him to watch Forrest Gump at 10 years old.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
